agency_name: Virginia School for the Deaf and the Blind
series_description: Documents the daily activities of students and staff within the dormitory.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

agency_name: Virginia School for the Deaf and the Blind
series_description: Documents students' progress in adapting to and living in a dormitory setting.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

agency_name: Virginia School for the Deaf and the Blind
series_description: Documents the goals and objectives of students and staff in adapting to dormitory life.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

agency_name: Virginia School for the Deaf and the Blind
series_description: Documents students permitted to participate in specific off-campus activities.

agency_name: Virginia School for the Deaf and the Blind
series_description: Documents telephonic communications between parents and dormitory staff.
retention_statement: Retain 1 year, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

agency_name: Virginia School for the Deaf and the Blind
series_description: Documents permission for day students (non-residents) to participate in evening activities.

agency_name: Virginia School for the Deaf and the Blind
series_description: Documents general parental permission to allow students to leave campus and participate in sponsored activities.

agency_name: Virginia School for the Deaf and the Blind
series_description: Documents staff permission for individual students to participate in off-campus activities.
retention_statement: Retain 1 week, then destroy. Disposal reporting onCertificate of Records Disposal (RM-3 form) notrequired.

agency_name: Virginia School for the Deaf and the Blind
series_description: Documents parental permission for students to have outside visitors.

agency_name: Virginia School for the Deaf and the Blind
series_description: Documents parental permission for students to visit homes of other students.

agency_name: Virginia School for the Deaf and the Blind
series_description: Documents students' progress during quarter in adapting to dormitory living.

agency_name: Virginia School for the Deaf and the Blind
retention_statement: Retain 1 year after end of school year, then destroy.

agency_name: Virginia School for the Deaf and the Blind
series_description: Documents comprehensive reporting of any serious incident involving a student.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

agency_name: Virginia School for the Deaf and the Blind
series_description: Documents suspension of students from school or activities.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

agency_name: Virginia School for the Deaf and the Blind
series_description: Documents audit trail of student cash secured in dormitory safe.

agency_name: Virginia School for the Deaf and the Blind
series_description: Documents preparation and transmittal of weekly reports on student behavior to parents.
retention_statement: Retain 1 year, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.
